body.name: DANCESOUL Transparent Wireless Mouse 3 Mode(BT5.1/BT5.1/2.4G) Bluetooth Mouse Silent Rechargeable Silm Portable Mouse for Laptop,PC,MacBook,Chromebook,iPad,Tablet (Black)

features: 【Three Connection Modes BT5.1/ BT5.1 / 2.4GHz】This Bluetooth mouse is equipped with an upgraded BT 5.0 chip, providing a more stable and low-latency connection. Alternatively, you can use the more stable and interference-resistant 2.4GHz wireless connection. It's plug-and-play, no driver required, and can connect to up to three devices. Simply touch the switch on the back to switch between 2.4GHz wireless and Bluetooth, providing more flexibility.

【Silent mouse and Mini Portable】We understand the importance of focusing on work, so we have reduced most of the noise when clicking the mouse, allowing you to improve work efficiency. The sliding of the metal material scroll wheel is also silent. The mouse receiver is inside the shell, so you don't have to worry about losing it during business trips. The mini mouse has a Pocket-sized, making it easy to put in your pocket or backpack, making it a good companion for business travel.

【Rechargeable with Battery Level Display】The mouse has a built-in high-quality rechargeable battery that lasts for several weeks on a full charge with a short charging time. It displays the real-time remaining battery level, allowing you to check the battery status easily. The mouse comes with a magnetic detachable transparent shell, which looks stylish and displays the battery level clearly. It's intelligently energy-efficient, reducing unnecessary power consumption, and can be awakened with a click of any button.

【3 Adjustable DPI and LED mouse】With 3 levels of adjustable DPI (800/1200/1600), you can choose the mouse cursor speed that suits you. This optical mouse is suitable for various types of mouse pads while maintaining high sensitivity and accuracy, quickly and precisely tracking to where you want to use it, whether in the office or in games.Equipped with LED lighting, creating a distinctive ambiance for work or study

【Ergonomic Design and Wide Compatibility】The symmetric ergonomic design and streamlined appearance of this Bluetooth mouse provide you with a comfortable feel, preventing fatigue from long-term use.Fits Notebook, Chromebook,Macbook,iPad, iPad Pro, MacBook pro, MacBook Air, PC, Laptop, Computer,tablet and more. Well compatible with Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10, 11, Mac OS X 10.4, PS4, PS5, Xbox, etc.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Magtic shell With USB A receiver,you can remove the transparent shell and take out receiver, so you don't have to worry about losing it anymore Silent click We know your demands of a quiet mouse. This wireless mouse reduces noise up to 90% while you can hardly hear any clicking noise. Rchargeable mouse Built-in high quality battery and an intelligent power saving system that makes it standby for a long time.

Ergonomics mouse Thanks to the excellent ergonomic design, this mouse is comfortably placed on the hand to prevent any possible wrist pain. 2.4G/Bluetooth Dual Mode Mouse Bluetooth5.1/5.1 With USB receiver, Can be used all devices with USB port and Tepy-c port, like Laptop,PC,Computer,MacBook,Runs on Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, 8, 10, 11, Mac OS X 10.4, Chromebook, PS4, PS5, Xbox, etc. Portable mice Slim Portable design makes it easy to slip in your bag for traveling.Mini mouse.
Fountion When starting to use the mouse, please remove the film at positions 1,2 and 3.Unique design and fashionable appearance,with led lighting, it provides you with a brand new mouse experience

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars FIRST THINGS FIRST...
reviews.reviewText: It took me a while to figure out, as I was afraid to pull too hard on the thin brittle plastic, but in order to access the USB inside, hold the bottom base in one hand & gently pull up on the clear plastic top from under the buttons, it should pop off via mini magnets!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Looks cool, but doesn't work well.
reviews.reviewText: I love the clear look of this mouse and the fact that it can be recharged via USB-C, but unfortunately this mouse is prone to reconnection issues. I can't stop using the mouse for more then 30 seconds without it disconnecting from my laptop. You would think shaking the mouse would wake it up and reestablish the connection but it doesn't. I have had slight luck with turning the mouse on the side and running my thumb along the laser on the bottom to get it to reconnect. When I bought the mouse I didn't anticipate that I would be spending most of my time trying to reconnect it but here I am.I would return it but I already threw away the box. 🙃

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sci-Fi mouse with three connection modes. Works while charging. May need a mousepad.
reviews.reviewText: I like to try out computer mice. I ordered this because my favorite mouse now requires frequent reconnecting, and a mouse with several connection options might be a good replacement or at least help troubleshooting.WHY A MULTI-MODE MOUSE? - It seems the main purpose is to allow switching between 2-3 different devices - using a separate mode for each device. Alternatively, the three modes can provide assurance that you can get the mouse to connect. With my old Bluetooth supporting laptop, neither Bluetooth mode works, but the "2.4 G" (USB plug) does.WHAT'S COOL- Attractive: Overall effect is black. But the transparent top reveals a mix of switches and components, plus decorative shapes and intermittent lights that add a "science fiction" aesthetic.- Rechargeable: Mouse can be used while charging. (run and recharge times not yet tested)- Three connection modes: Bluetooth 5.0, Bluetooth 3.0, "2.4 G" (USB plug)- Ability to switch between three devices. (not tested)- DPI can be switched from the mouse w/o going into settings.BUT ALSO KNOW- The lamp engine is not an "all surface" type and may require a mousepad on some surfaces - such as a varnished table top.- The wheel has a "third button," but does not have side switches for horizontal scrolling.- The flat profile fits better in a computer bag, but is less comfortable in my hand that the "humped" mice that prevail today.- The battery charge indicator only works when you turn on the power switch - it's a feature not a bug.- CAUTION re. charging: Some sellers of similar models strongly encourage charging ONLY from a computer USB port, and paricularly warn against rapid chargers. Indeed, the specs of this mouse say 4.2 volts, so better not trickle charge, eh? One simple approach: Don't precharge, but use it as wired mouse while it's charging.- Remember that transparent goodies need extra care - because scratches show easily.OTHER- This unit is one of a family of very similar devices with different brand names and different arrays of "science fiction" furniture and lamps under the magnet-fitted transparent top - although this unit may be the most attractive and dignified of them all. But the others may have additional features, such as lamps that reveal the current DPI and transmission mode, or a "boss switch" (an old term) that immediately opens your computer's desktop.- I am so far clueless about the functional difference between the two bluetooth modes. But when using the mouse with my desktop, my Bluetooth 5.3 plug only works with the mouse's 5.0 mode, whereas my Bluetooth 4.0 plug works with both.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: DANCESOUL Transparent Wireless Mouse 3 Mode(BT5.1/BT5.1/2.4G) Bluetooth Mouse Silent Rechargeable Silm Portable Mouse for Laptop,PC,MacBook,Chromebook,iPad,Tablet (Black)It works reasonably well for casual mousing needs. The mouse is quiet, though not silent. I've used mice that are very quiet with almost inaudible clicks. This one is not silent but it is quiet enough.Issues: not many but a significant issue is in the buttons. When I press and hold the button, sometimes it will trigger a click hold release, and even when I apply enough pressure to keep the button depressed, I notice some inadvertent release. The three DPS options also leave more to be desired. I couldn't find the one that I find most natural. Overall though it is a nice mouse, with the quirks mentioned above.
